amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund relating to protecting the privacy of American taxpayer and small business tax information while only reporting large financial account balances to the Internal Revenue Service, to ensure those evading the tax system pay what they owe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3365 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 322.
